titleInfo.title: Free Relative Constructions In OT Syntax
Resolving conflicts in grammars: optimality theory in syntax, morphology, and phonology

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Vogel, R. (2002). Free Relative Constructions In OT Syntax. In G. Fanselow & C. Féry (Eds.), Linguistische Berichte. Sonderheft: Vol. 11. Resolving conflicts in grammars: optimality theory in syntax, morphology, and phonology (pp. 119-162). Hamburg: Buske.
